name: Silver Oak 250g + Channi
description:
Smooth Hazelnut, Honey, and Grape Notes: This medium roast blend offers a refined balance of flavours, with a touch of hazelnut, natural honey sweetness, and a subtle hint of grapes for a truly unique taste. 

Best Paired with Milk: Perfectly smooth and creamy with milk, this coffee shines in espresso-based drinks, adding depth and richness to your cup. 

Includes a Stainless-Steel Channi: The stainless steel channi (filter) in this combo makes it easy to prepare a perfectly filtered cup, adding convenience to your coffee ritual and making it a thoughtful gift for coffee lovers. 

Versatile Brewing Options—Channi-Friendly for Easy Brewing: This blend is ideal for espresso and manual brews, whether you prefer AeroPress, Pour Over, or even a refreshing cold brew. With the channi, you can effortlessly enjoy a smooth, flavourful cup at home. 

Description: Discover the layered taste of Silver Oak Café Blend, where each sip brings notes of hazelnut, honey, and grapes. Designed to pair beautifully with milk, this medium roast works well in espresso-based drinks and manual brews, and can be easily brewed with the channi for a rich coffee experience.
